flawed_nl_solution:
At least one person lives in 17/20 * 120 = <<17/20*120=102>>102 apartments.
At least two persons live in 3/5 * 120 = <<3/5*120=27>>27 apartments.
So in every of the 102 - 27 = <<75*1=75>>75 apartments, only one person is living.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 72, not 27. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
